title: Using a Karthus ult for the first time.

replies.body:
I'm just sad that there are literally so many counters to {{champion:30}} ult. {{item:3157}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:26}} {{item:3157}} 

Feels like every time I play Karthus in draft I just get counterpicked to oblivion.
You forgot my favorite, Pantheon ulting to avoid the damage.
right on top of Karthus

{{champion:57}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:12}} The list goes on.

Uh.... Sona?...Janna?????....GANKPLANK?!?!?!?

Why are these your counters? :D

{{champion:37}} Shield + heal almost always negates most of the ult damage.
{{champion:40}} Same as the above
{{champion:41}} More heal the lower he is = can't kill him

Sona or Janna can probably disable you if they're close enough...
Then again, the karthus would wait until he was dead to use his ult

karthus however has some of the best synergy. he synergizes very well with any of the other super high range characters, so long as you both don't hit at the same time. i mean, karth won't get the kill but as they prep for karth ult they will be caught off guard by the other one, and if they do somehow manage to block the other one then karthus will likely end up going through.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NBg5lVRJ,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2016-05-11T13:26:07.753+0000)
>
> karthus however has some of the best synergy. he synergizes very well with any of the other super high range characters, so long as you both don't hit at the same time. i mean, karth won't get the kill but as they prep for karth ult they will be caught off guard by the other one, and if they do somehow manage to block the other one then karthus will likely end up going through.

I like Karthus Mid with Shen Top.

Tell Bot Lane "When Karth and Shen hit 6, all in IMMEDIATELY.  Regardless.  Jungle and mid roamed to, cool... dive it."

Shen Ults in, Karthus Ults, Shen Taunts... 4 Dead fools and a happy ADC and Support bot.

Especially if our Jungle ganks at the same time.
And that is why you don't pick Karthus unless you're late in the pick order.

I was in a beginner bots game. I didn't fully read the spell, but I knew it did damage.

So I _walked up_ to Malzahar bot sitting in mid lane, used my ult, then started trying to hit him with my Q's and E.
He dodged most of the stuff and got away after killing me.

I didn't even realize my ult affected the whole map. I just felt defeated because it seemed to do so little damage, had a long cast time, and had a really long cooldown.
:c

When the Pool Party Party IP weekend rolled around though a few months later, I decided to get Karthus and try him out again because I was moderately sure that his kit was actually cool and I misused it in the bot game. I'm glad I did--he's my favorite mid laner right now. (Favorite champion, actually.)
Best ult is when you try to kill chump that run away with low hp and you get double or triple without actually seeing any of your victims.

Except when this happens

{{champion:67}} WTF KARTHUS I HAD THAT KILL
{{champion:30}} sry man i was trying to kill my own lane opponent and i didn't see-
{{champion:67}} IM AFK
{{champion:59}} Hey look at that Karthus, your ult is even more useless.
Very original.
:P
You j ust made me really want to watch the harry potter series again
And the entire team collapses inside a {{champion:432}} ultimate so you get nothing.
I said it once and I'll say it again. It's still fun to use it even if it fails
I was never denying that.

RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR

...

http://pa1.narvii.com/5699/9a1a323e615a76dc2a5c1ba5a0898efcf67d7944_hq.gif

this is how I read that.
then you realize the whole enemy team had {{item:3157}}
It's still fun to use even if it fails....
Even the Jhin ADC. {{champion:202}}
My first Karthus ult was a double kill.

> [{quoted}](name=00MarkofKaine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NBg5lVRJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-11T01:18:57.840+0000)
>
> My first Karthus ult was a double kill.

My first one was a triple, the most satisfying part of which was the enemy jungler who we hadn't seen for a good minute or two died ;P
That guy had to have been upset.  Running around low in the jungle just trying to get that last camp or two to finish an item before you go back, Karthus ults to kill your teammate, kills you too.

> [{quoted}](name=Jambajewz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NBg5lVRJ,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-11T22:26:39.398+0000)
>
> That guy had to have been upset.  Running around low in the jungle just trying to get that last camp or two to finish an item before you go back, Karthus ults to kill your teammate, kills you too.

It's still hilarious though ;P
Trust me, if Karthus was played more often, junglers would be less likely to risk it doing that.
oh for sure, a lot of times you forget karthus is even in your game until he drops that ulti, then you're just like, oh yeah, damn.

> [{quoted}](name=Jambajewz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NBg5lVRJ,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-13T05:28:02.713+0000)
>
> oh for sure, a lot of times you forget karthus is even in your game until he drops that ulti, then you're just like, oh yeah, damn.

Yeah. There are three types of Karthuses (Karthi?): the ones who are legitimitely just feeders, the ones who can land a good ult and that's it, and then the Karthuses that are not about for about 30 minutes aside from finishing kills with ult before coming around and raping teamfights. 2/3 times though what ends up happening is you'll be hit with a karthus ult every 2-4 minutes.

Karthas ult, Slow telegraphed, and easy to itemize for....

Better nerf QSS'ing Zed's ult!

Hourglass, and generic magic resist items that are good against any mage is hardly itemizing against his ult.  It has to be slow and telegraphed because it hits everyone, his ult is genuinely balanced, use it in a safe place or after you die or you've got a chance to be interrupted, it's fair.
What's the incantation again...let's see here...Oh right! R!
